    • getTextUserDataAccessObject

      public static IReadWriteUserDataAccessObject getTextUserDataAccessObject​(ConsoleAdminSession a) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      Gets the read and write/ read only version of TextUserDataAccessObject interface. Admin session, Student course registrar, registration data access object returns read and write version User session, login control returns read only version
      Parameters:
      a - admin session
      Returns:
      an instance of read and write/ read only version of TextUserDataAccessObject
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - when there is error in accessing files
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - when class is not found

    • createStudent

      public static Student createStudent​(java.lang.String name, School school, Gender gender, Nationality nationality, int maxAUs) throws PasswordStorage.CannotPerformOperationException
      Creates a Student with given maximum AUs value.
      Parameters:
      name - String that stores the student's name
      school - School object that stores the school the student belongs to
      gender - Gender object that stores the student's gender
      nationality - Nationality object that stores the student's nationality
      maxAUs - Integer that stores the maximum AUs that student can take
      Returns:
      Student object
      Throws:
      PasswordStorage.CannotPerformOperationException - unsafe to verify password on platform

      Parameters:
      name - String that stores the Staff person's name
      school - School object that stores the school the Staff person belongs to

      nationality - Nationality object that stores the Staff person's nationality
      Returns:

      Throws:

    • createIndex

      public static Index createIndex​(int indexNumber, int maxClassSize)
      Creates an index with tutorials and lab sessions.
      Parameters:
      indexNumber - Integer that stores the index number of the index class
      maxClassSize - Integer that stores the maximum number of students allowed to be registered in the index class
      Returns:
      Index object

    • createCourse

      public static Course createCourse​(java.lang.String courseCode, java.lang.String courseName, School school, java.util.Hashtable<DayOfWeek,​java.util.List<java.time.LocalTime>> lectureTimings, Venue lectureVenue, int AUs, java.util.ArrayList<Index> indexes)
      Creates a course, given indexes.
      Parameters:
      courseCode - String that stores code of the course
      courseName - String that stores the name of the course
      school - School object that stores which school the course belongs to
      lectureTimings - Hashtable object that stores lecture timings as a day of the week, and time in HH:MM format
      lectureVenue - Venue object that stores lecture location of the course
      AUs - Integer that stores the course's AU value
      indexes - ArrayList object that stores indexes of the course
      Returns:
      newly created course
